title: For the First Time in Honduras: Citi Presents Juan Luis Guerra in Concert
summary: Tegucigalpa, Honduras – Citi Honduras presents Juan Luis Guerra in concert, October 22, 2011, at the Chochi Sosa Stadium in Tegucigalpa. Guerra is recognized as the top Latin Grammy winner in the history of Latin music.
tag-1: For the First Time in Honduras: Citi Presents Juan Luis Guerra in Concert
tag-3: Tegucigalpa, Honduras – Citi Honduras presents Juan Luis Guerra in concert, October 22, 2011, at the Chochi Sosa Stadium in Tegucigalpa. Guerra is recognized as the top Latin Grammy winner in the history of Latin music.
tag-4: The concert will benefit the Abrigo Foundation, a nonprofit organization whose mission is to provide shelter, food and rest to patients and their families who are treated at the largest public hospitals in the country: the Teaching Hospital in the capital city and the Mario Catarino Rivas Hospital in San Pedro Sula.
tag-5: With a clear customer focus, Citi presents the biggest dance concert in the history of Honduras, offering its customers exclusive benefits, including pre-sale tickets with a 15 percent discount on all seats bought with Citi credit or debit cards during the first week. Thereafter, Citi's customers will enjoy a 10 percent discount.
tag-6: "Citi is proud to present the most anticipated entertainment event for Hondurans—the exclusive Juan Luis Guerra concert– while offering exclusive discounts and easy payment terms on the purchase of tickets. It is also an honor to help the Abrigo Foundation, an initiative that is aligned with our social commitment to the communities where we do business," said Bianka Lagunes, Marketing and Public Relations Head for Citi Honduras.
tag-7: Tickets will be on sale beginning Wednesday, September 14, at Citi kiosks located in the parking lot in front of the Citi Financial Center, Multiplaza, Metromall in Tegucigalpa and the Mall Multiplaza in San Pedro Sula.
tag-8: In addition, Citi will offer easy payment terms to its clients, including zero percent financing in six monthly installments or at no charge redeeming their Multpremios Miles in exchange for tickets.

tag-10: The Juan Luis Guerra concert will be presented by Citi, jointly with the sponsorship of Claro and Corona beer and co-sponsored by Intercontinental Royal Hotel, Avis Rent a Car, La Tribuna and Emisoras Unidas. Production and staging will be handled by Two Shows Productions.
tag-11: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. tag-13: Abrigo Foundation Abrigo Foundation provides shelter, food and rest for sick people and/or their families who are treated at the largest public hospitals in the country: the Teaching Hospital in the capital city, and the Mario Catarino Rivas Hospital in San Pedro Sula, coming from other provinces of the country. With the support of individual and corporate donors, who provide support through periodic donations, in goods and in cash, it provides shelter to more than 70,000 people in Tegucigalpa and San Pedro Sula, and serves more than 215,000 meals. Joint efforts are also arranged to perform open and close-heart surgery in infants and children with different cardiovascular conditions.
